word:
MR No. 269 - Attitude Toward Creeds

     The prayer of Christ to His Father, contained in the seventeenth chapter of John, is to be our church creed. It shows us that our difference and disunion are dishonoring to God. Read the whole chapter, verse by verse.--Ms 12, 1899, p. 1. ("The Need of a Knowledge of God's Word," typed February 22, 1899.) 

Released June 22, 1971.
